properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 17 at 10:38AM MST until January 17 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Riverton WY
properties.description:
...Snow for the Far West Today...

.A weather system will bring snow and windy weather to western
Wyoming today. The gusty wind will cause areas of blowing and
drifting snow, which will impact travel and outdoor activities.

* WHAT...Blowing and drifting of snow, along with some light
snow. Visibility will be under a quarter mile in spots from
blowing snow. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph.

* WHERE...Wind River Mountains West including South Pass.

* WHEN...Until 5 PM MST this afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Travel will become very difficult due to
considerable blowing and drifting of snow.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Those planning outdoor activities should
be prepared for hazardous winter weather.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling. Please share with
someone your travel plans.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON
